name: discord_scrape_members
description: Scrape the member list of a Discord server. Returns usernames and roles for visible members.

parameters.name: channel_url
parameters.description: Any channel URL in the server (e.g. 'https://discord.com/channels/123/456')

steps.code: const membersToggle = document.querySelector('button[aria-label*="Member"], button[aria-label*="member"]'); if (membersToggle) membersToggle.click(); return { toggled: true }
steps.name: show_members
steps.label: Show member list

steps.code: const members = []; const memberEls = document.querySelectorAll('[class*="member"][class*="container"], [class*="memberInner"]'); let currentRole = ''; for (const el of memberEls) { const roleHeader = el.querySelector('[class*="membersGroup"] span, h2'); if (roleHeader) { currentRole = roleHeader.textContent.trim(); continue; } const nameEl = el.querySelector('[class*="username"], span[class*="name"]'); const statusEl = el.querySelector('[class*="status"]'); if (nameEl) { members.push({ username: nameEl.textContent.trim(), role: currentRole, status: statusEl ? statusEl.textContent.trim() : 'offline' }); } } if (members.length === 0) { const fallbackEls = document.querySelectorAll('[class*="members"] [class*="content"]'); fallbackEls.forEach(el => { const text = el.textContent.trim(); if (text && text.length < 100) members.push({ username: text, role: '', status: '' }); }); } return { member_count: members.length, members: members.slice(0, 50) }
steps.name: members_list
steps.label: Extract member list
